long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manager group joined on Facebook is a powerful web browser extension that helps users manage and check the groups they are admins or have joined on Facebook. This extension offers a bunch of useful features to enhance the Facebook group management experience.

The main features of Manager group joined on Facebook include:

Manage admin groups: The extension allows users to easily manage groups of which they are admins. Users can view the group list, edit group information, manage members, and approve requests to join the group.

Manage joined groups: Users can see a list of groups they have joined. Extension allows users to manage personal information in the group, turn off notifications from the group or leave the group if necessary.
